item.text: Mixed online and offline learning: skillsharing happens in real spaces which is shared online. Work happens in distributed teams. Like this we are aiming to solve the problem of MOOCS not sufficiently increasing student's social capital.
In conversation with [[Mike Caulfield]] we started to outline a series of [[Roles or Hats]] that might enable a more explicit contract with people working together on a [[Happening]]:
item.title: Federated Wiki Roles
